event.description: {CovLStrv2{{t{Local variable {0} uses {1} bytes of stack space, which exceeds the maximum single use of {2} bytes.}{{code{cx}}}{24600}{10000}}}}

typePropertiesGroup.localEffect: Excessive stack use may cause stack overflow in embedded applications. Stack size limits are configurable.
typePropertiesGroup.longDescription: Excessive use of stack memory by local variables or parameters
